presidentReport: Welcome to the November board meeting. We're wrapping up another successful year with strong participation across all club activities.
Holiday party planning is underway. Looking forward to celebrating together in December.
vicePresidentReport: Repeater upgrade project proposals have been received from three vendors. Full analysis will be presented at the December meeting.
Working on technical presentation schedule for early 2025. Members are encouraged to suggest topics.

report: Both repeaters continue to operate reliably. Fall maintenance completed successfully.
Evaluating backup power upgrades to improve storm resilience. Budget proposal forthcoming.
Initial planning for spring Technician class is underway. Target start date is March 1st.
Coordinating with local schools for STEM outreach opportunities in the new year.

oldBusiness: Field Day 2025 site selection - committee to report next month
Repeater upgrade funding approved - work to begin in February
Club website redesign - new site launched successfully
newBusiness: Proposal to sponsor local high school STEM club - approved
Summer picnic planning - June 20th tentative date
Request for club participation in emergency communications drill
announcements: Next VE session: February 5th at 10:00 AM
State convention registration now open - early bird discount until Feb 1st
Monthly breakfast: Every Saturday at 8:00 AM at Joe's Diner
Next board meeting: February 19th at 7:00 PM
